column8: Not surprising, given the no. of trips bijan have made to rural areas this past week.Complete with announcing "incentives"

At least he acknowledge the pattern. Oppo can win urban areas but then to win general election is to have enough numbers of MP in Parliament, which still many seats still belongs to non-urban area.It is a game of numbers - you can win all the cities or towns but if the total number is still smaller than the other party, you will not going to form the federal government. The key if Oppo wants to win the election is the non-urban area, which means non-urban area issue and presence at rural area. Rural people basically don't care much things on national level or fat-fetch issue, what they concern more is on their daily livelihood - things that affect them directly. BN knows this very well and hold a good grip on it, which something Oppo have to put good strategy for it.
urbanization is a no no for umno, there he said it.y not he put MCA candidate there since DAP put malay candidate in malay area.topkek bodo.
